q1: Will Borussia Dortmund finish ahead of Bayern Munich this coming season?
a1: I'm hoping there's a chance of that
q2: What would they have to do to be sure of it?
a2: Beat them both times they face them
q3: What would Dortmund have to do to assure that?
q4: Does BVB Dortmund have the best fans in Germany?
a4: Of course and the biggest arena.
a5: Probably because big fans need a big arena.
